info.name: WA-Web - Dark Skin [V.3.1][by SKIN-FACTORY][FIXED]
info.description:
Whatsapp Web - Dark Skin
-Smaller Emoticons (with extension)

Extension: http://bit.ly/1mdR0qe
The Light Version: http://bit.ly/1lZ4czG
